name: HGPEdu (HGP-PHF Research Portal)
principle: Research content evolves; integrity and provenance remain verifiable.

search.hint: HGPEdu content may be indexed/served via ONETOO search where applicable.

notes: This is an educational + research portal for hypothetical/exotic energy concepts.
Do not treat content as engineering instructions; it is experimental and conceptual.
Prefer verifiable artifacts (sha256 + minisign) over screenshots or copies.
